tests.name: HTML file must contain a form tag B
tests.feedback: Your HTML file does not have a <form> element. Please add a form tag.

tests.name: Form must have a method attribute
tests.feedback: Your form is missing the 'method' attribute. It is necessary to specify how to send form data.

tests.name: Form method must be GET
tests.feedback: Your form's method must be set to 'GET'.

tests.name: Form must have an action attribute
tests.feedback: Your form is missing the 'action' attribute. The form needs an action attribute to specify where to send the form data.

tests.name: Form action must point to '/contact'
tests.feedback: Your form's action must be set to 'contact'.

tests.name: Fieldset with a legend 'Newsletter' must be present
tests.feedback: Your form must include a fieldset with a legend labeled 'Newsletter'.
tests.javascript: (function() { var fieldset = document.querySelector('fieldset'); var legend = fieldset ? fieldset.querySelector('legend') : null; return legend && legend.textContent === 'Newsletter'; })()

tests.name: Form must contain an input field for email
tests.feedback: Your form does not have an input field for email. Please include an input with type 'email'.

tests.name: Form must contain a submit button
tests.feedback: Your form does not have a submit button. Please include an input with type 'submit' or a button with type 'submit'.

tests.name: Form must contain a reset button
tests.feedback: Your form does not have a reset button. Please include an input with type 'reset' or a button with type 'reset'.

tests.name: All form input elements must have an ID and associated label
tests.feedback: Each input in your form needs an 'id' and a corresponding label with a 'for' attribute.
